00019     public class ChartBuilder
00020     {
00021         private ChartConfigProvider currConfig;
00022         private Chart chartToBuild;
00023 
00024         //XAxis labeling
00025         string xAxisLabelSeriesName = string.Empty;
00026         ArrayList xAxisLabelValues;

00031         public ChartBuilder()
00032         {
00033         }

00039         public ChartBuilder(ChartConfigProvider ChartConfig, Chart ChartToBuild)
00040         {
00041             currConfig = ChartConfig;
00042             chartToBuild = ChartToBuild;
00043 
00044             XmlDocument xmlData = GetXmlData();
00045 
00046             BuildXAxisLabels(xmlData);
00047 
00048             FillSeriesData(xmlData);
00049         }
00050 
00051         private void BuildXAxisLabels(XmlDocument xmlData)
00052         {
00053             xAxisLabelValues = new ArrayList();
00054 
00055             //Find the name of the series with the xaxis label
00056             //Get the xAxisLabel values
00057             foreach (ChartConfigSeries ccSeries in currConfig.Series)
00058             {
00059                 if (ccSeries.IsXAxisLabel == true)
00060                 {
00061                     xAxisLabelSeriesName = ccSeries.Name;
00062 
00063                     XmlNodeList data = xmlData.SelectNodes(ccSeries.XPath);
00064 
00065                     foreach (XmlNode nd in data)
00066                     {
00067                         xAxisLabelValues.Add(DateTime.Parse(nd.InnerText));
00068                     }
00069                 }
00070             }
00071         }
00072 
00073         private void FillSeriesData(XmlDocument xmlData)
00074         {
00075             foreach (ChartConfigSeries ccSeries in currConfig.Series)
00076             {
00077                 //Ignore the xAxisLabelSeries when populating y axis data
00078                 if (ccSeries.Name != xAxisLabelSeriesName)
00079                 {
00080                     
00081                     XmlNodeList data = xmlData.SelectNodes(ccSeries.XPath);
00082 
00083                     int xAxisIndex = 0;
00084                     foreach (XmlNode nd in data)
00085                     {
00086                         if (xAxisLabelValues.Count > 0)
00087                         {
00088                             ccSeries.Points.AddXY(xAxisLabelValues[xAxisIndex], nd.InnerText);
00089 
00090                         }
00091                         else
00092                         {
00093                             ccSeries.Points.AddXY(xAxisIndex, nd.InnerText);
00094                         }
00095                         xAxisIndex++;
00096                     }
00097                     xAxisIndex = 0;
00098 
00099                     chartToBuild.Series.Add((Series)ccSeries);
00100                 }
00101             }
00102         }
00103 
00104         private XmlDocument GetXmlData()
00105         {
00106             // Now that we have the URI, we can call it and get the XML
00107             Uri uri = new Uri(currConfig.URI);
00108             WebClient webClient = new WebClient();
00109             Stream phData = webClient.OpenRead(uri);
00110             XmlTextReader xmlText = new XmlTextReader(phData);
00111             XmlDocument xmlData = new XmlDocument();
00112             xmlData.Load(xmlText);
00113 
00114             return xmlData;
00115         }
00116     }
